alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Warning issued June 24 at 9:46PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...High Surf Warning remains in effect... * SURF...Surf heights of 13 to 16 feet will continue to impact south and east facing shores. * TIMING...through Saturday morning * IMPACTS...Dangerous surfs and deadly rip currents. Lapataiga mo galu matua maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 946 PO ASO FARAILE IUNI 24 2022 ...O loo faaauau Lapataiga mo Galu maualuluga... * GALU...Galu matua maualuluga e 13 i le 16 futu o le aafia ai talafatai i saute ma sasa`e o le atunuu. * TAIMI...seia oo i le taeao o le Aso Toona`i. * AAFIAGA...Galu matua maualuluga. E malolosi le aave ma le tatafe o le sami. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O lapataiga mo galu maualuluga e faailoa mai ai le malolosi ma le tetele o galu o le a aafia ai gataifale ma matafaga, ma o le a malolosi aave o le sami e ono solo ai nisi o vaega o le matafaga. Faiva po o le ona o le siisii o tulaga o sami ma galu, e le tatau i le au fai mamalu lautele ona fagogota pe maimoa i galu. O i latou i le matafaga, e mafai ona maua faafuaseia e galu.
info.instruction: A high surf warning indicates dangerous large breaking waves will pound the shoreline in the warning area, producing deadly rip currents and localized beach erosion. Also, it is extremely dangerous to fish or observe waves from rocks during high surf conditions. Unwary beach walkers can be caught off guard as waves suddenly race farther up the beach than normal.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
